name: Colors! (itch)
description:
Colors!

It's all about hitting the right circles. You have to stay alert and hit the right ones. When you will see name of colour just hit it as soon as possible.

Try to beat your records.

We want to make this game clearer , but we don't have enough funds. We will be glad if you would support us.

It's our first project , so please be indulgent. Thanks for your attention and good luck!
